alert.note: Alert for Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 2:59PM EDT until July 11 at 3:06AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Branch of The Housatonic At Coltsville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 5 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near 5.1 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.1 feet on 06/07/2000. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Eb Housatonic Coltsville Flood Stage: 5.0 Observed Stage at Mon 2 pm: 5.1 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 5.1 Mon 8 pm 5.0 Tue 2 am 4.0 Tue 8 am 3.3 Tue 2 pm 2.7 &&
